biotools.summary: Identifiy likely genotyping errors and mutations for a sib pair in the context of multipoint mapping. Using a hidden Markov model, the program calculates the posterior probability of genotyping error or mutation for each sib-pair-marker combination, given all the available marker data, an assumed genotype-error rate, and a known genetic map.

bioschemas.name: SIBMED
